directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Combine tortellini and spinach and bring to a boil; reduce heat slightly and boil for 7 minutes. Drain and add to the tomatoes and broth; simmer for 20 minutes. Serve.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package prepared cheese tortellini, thawed
title: Tortellini Soup
